about_the_game:
Journey across mythological Japan as a trio of samurai heroes hell-bent on freeing Japan from the clutches of evil. Fight through 13 challenging levels across different terrains such as the dark forest, the underworld and through snow and ice. In your journey, you will face nemesis from the daemon world, but you are not alone. As you fight, the Ally system will kick in and the other heroes will come to your aid. Discover the fate of the heroes and learn about the story of the heroes in this story driven indie action adventure game.





Switch between 3 Samurai Heroes and fight your enemies. Experience different fighting styles of each hero and build up momentum for combo attacks. Experience the Ally system where the non selected characters help you in your battle. Fight as a team for you are not alone.





Perform unique attacks by interacting with the environment to do maximum damage to your enemies. Look for opportunities when confronting larger groups of enemies to take them down more efficiently.





Build up your momentum for each Samurai Hero. When the time is right, use it to unleash powerful combo attacks against your enemies involving 2 or 3 heroes. Use it wisely so that you can eliminate as much enemies as possible. If you wasted your combo attack against a smaller group of enemies, you have to build up the momentum again.

name: Blades of Heroes: Samurai Rising
short_description: An Action Adventure 3rd person hack and slash game set in Mythological Japan. Travel as a trio of Samurai Heroes and switch between them as you fight enemies with the help of an Ally system. Perform special combo attacks as you travel across Japan, hell-bent on destroying the forces of evil.
